full_sentence: They worship the Shin, Satan. Most leaders in Satanism are likely Jews. Shin is El Shaddai, who is Yahway. Fellow Christians, STOP calling the Eternal Creator Yahway! Please do wake up and learn something for a change.

full_sentence: A Mestizo, traditionally, is essentially someone of Mixed European and Native descent whose parentage is less than 3/4 European. Usually they are not visibly different from Europeans.

full_sentence: As of 2010, black people are falsly overrepresented among serial killers by 4.5 times. They comprise 13% of the U.S. population but, in 2010, were innacurately presented as 59.8% of serial killers. More stats wrongly indicate that they have always made up a disproportionate number of serial killers since 1900.
